channel.title: RonKJeffries tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from RonKJeffries.

item.description: @garethmyles Pixel 6 at the discounted price is a solid phone and a great (!) value. I am enjoying mine.

item.description: Re-tweeting because this is awesome sauce. Never mind that different people vie Twitter at different times. Plus my feed has very little reach. Oh well.;) https://t.co/Z0mLnSFGoK

item.description: Looking for a browser to view an rss.xml file. e.g. https://t.co/nW2cdTFHpn is a directory of people who are experimenting with the LOVELY!! Tweetfeed service created by @davewiner Need to be able to view the various Tweet streams embedded in the file. Don't want desktop app. ;)
item.source:markdown: Looking for a browser to view an rss.xml file. e.g. https://t.co/nW2cdTFHpn is a directory of people who are experimenting with the LOVELY!! Tweetfeed service created by @davewiner Need to be able to view the various Tweet streams embedded in the file. Don't want desktop app. ;)

item.title: sound bar Q Recently bought a mid-range Samsung 65 inch TV with decent image quality but meh sound quality. Prices for sound bars seem out of line with the cost of the TV.
item.description: Which sound bar might make sense? This doesn't seem like rocket science.
item.source:markdown: Which sound bar might make sense? This doesn't seem like rocket science.

item.description:
I need a dead simple RSS reader to play with. I have the dilemna of wanting to view this personal feed : https://t.co/XSHTDmLLmb from @davewiner new service. Feedly and others are clogged with my ancient Google+ list of many feeds. I just want to see this new feed. Sigh

UPDATE: Got feedreader,com working. Thanks for attending my TEDtalk.
item.source:markdown:
I need a dead simple RSS reader to play with. I have the dilemna of wanting to view this personal feed : https://t.co/XSHTDmLLmb from @davewiner new service. Feedly and others are clogged with my ancient Google+ list of many feeds. I just want to see this new feed. Sigh
UPDATE: Got feedreader,com working. Thanks for attending my TEDtalk.

item.description:
at time approx 22.5 "Let's destroy PowerPoint."

Quote from Emad Mostaque, founder of https://t.co/zzgSjZvsbT which released Stable Diffusion OPEN SOURCE model that runs using rather modest compute/GPU/memory resources https://t.co/QKsPkOyP61

#AI-viz
item.source:markdown:
at time approx 22.5 "Let's destroy PowerPoint."
Quote from Emad Mostaque, founder of https://t.co/zzgSjZvsbT which released Stable Diffusion OPEN SOURCE model that runs using rather modest compute/GPU/memory resources https://t.co/QKsPkOyP61
#AI-viz

item.description:
Interview with Emad Mostaque, founder of Stability AI. Image creation using AI e.g. DALLE2 or the far more efficient Stable Diffusion code (it's open source...) is producing exciting creative results.

Well worth 25 minutes of your time. We do live in exciting times.

#Ai-viz
item.source:markdown:
Interview with Emad Mostaque, founder of Stability AI. Image creation using AI e.g. DALLE2 or the far more efficient Stable Diffusion code (it's open source...) is producing exciting creative results.
Well worth 25 minutes of your time. We do live in exciting times.
#Ai-viz

item.description: Climate change is not future tense. https://t.co/ZPBEsrlv8T

item.description:
@Neil_Sarg @teamVRY I paid Apple to replace the battery in my OG iPhone SE to have a foot in the IOS world. It doesn't have a SIM yet, so for now I just use it on wi-fi. A friend has an iPhone 13 Mini, it's very nice.

Playing with Apple News +. Not yet sure about the value prop.
item.source:markdown:
@Neil_Sarg @teamVRY I paid Apple to replace the battery in my OG iPhone SE to have a foot in the IOS world. It doesn't have a SIM yet, so for now I just use it on wi-fi. A friend has an iPhone 13 Mini, it's very nice.
Playing with Apple News +. Not yet sure about the value prop.

item.description:
Just learned about Youtube Podcasts via Phone Show Chat group on MeWe. Thanks @tedsalmonuk

Have not yet played with it. I use Google Podcasts, (so-so IMO). If only YouTube would provide audio only service to reduce mobile data as I listen while driving.

https://t.co/D7aRvneHyg
item.source:markdown:
Just learned about Youtube Podcasts via Phone Show Chat group on MeWe. Thanks @tedsalmonuk
